Entries.DialogueText: Hey, kid. The name's Pam.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, kid. The 's Pam.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't be a jerk and we'll get along fine.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't be a jerk and we'll get along fine.

Entries.DialogueText: Well I'll be darned... I never expected to get a gift like this. You made my day, kid!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well I'll be darned... I never expected to get a gift like this. You made my day, kid!

Entries.DialogueText: Looks like there's some unique fish swimmin' around. Next time I'll have to bring my pole!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Looks like there's some unique fish swimmin' around. Next I'll have to bring my pole!

Entries.DialogueText: Heh... Willy gave us each a piece of his fish jerky on the ride over. Delicious!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heh... Willy gave us each a piece of his fish jerky on the ride over. Delicious!

Entries.DialogueText: I'll really miss that girl... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll really miss that girl...

Entries.DialogueText: You treat my Penny good, now. You hear me? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You treat my Penny good, now. You hear me?

Entries.DialogueText: So, you married the Mullner boy, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: So, you married the Mullner boy, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: Will you be takin' that smelly old dog with ya, too?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Will you be takin' that smelly old dog with ya, too?

Entries.DialogueText: It's a sign from the Almighty... We're doomed...%noturn {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a sign from the Almighty... We're doomed...

Entries.DialogueText: Well, I guess the end-times haven't come just yet, kid...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, I guess the end-s haven't come just yet, kid...

Entries.DialogueText: Ah well, back to the ol' nine to five...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah well, back to the ol' nine to five...

Entries.DialogueText: I think these rains are a show of force... a warning.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think these rains are a show of force... a warning.

Entries.DialogueText: You could say it's from nature, from Yoba, whatever you like... but that's what I think.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You could say it's from nature, from Yoba, whatever you like... but that's what I think.

Entries.DialogueText: What I mean is, we can't get too cocky. Or else, instead of a green rain, maybe we'll have a blood-red rain... See what I mean?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What I mean is, we can't get too cocky. Or else, instead of a green rain, maybe we'll have a blood-red rain... See what I mean?

Entries.DialogueText: Penny came home crying... what'd you do to her? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Penny came home crying... what'd you do to her?

Entries.DialogueText: Heard you got a fish pond built... Heh, I grew up with a fish pond.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heard you got a fish pond built... Heh, I grew up with a fish pond.

Entries.DialogueText: You can raise just about anything in one of those... But some of the fancier fish are real fussy!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can raise just about anything in one of those... But some of the fancier fish are real fussy!

Entries.DialogueText: Alright, alright... you beat me fair and square at the fishing event, kid.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Alright, alright... you beat me fair and square at the fishing event, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... maybe my problem was using that beer-battered mushroom as bait... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... maybe my problem was using that beer-battered mushroom as bait...

Entries.DialogueText: Now this is comfort! I might even take my shoes off! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now this is comfort! I might even take my shoes off!

Entries.DialogueText: Better not look too closely at my feet, kid.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Better not look too closely at my feet, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a special occasion, kid... I'm ordering something unique. Make it a double! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a special occasion, kid... I'm ordering something unique. Make it a double!

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, would you look at that... It's like something out of the future.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, would you look at that... It's like something out of the future.

Entries.DialogueText: Hehe, sorry kid... I can't use that. There's more buttons than I have brain cells! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hehe, sorry kid... I can't use that. There's more buttons than I have brain cells!

Entries.DialogueText: I can't believe you bought me a house! Is there any catch?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can't believe you bought me a house! Is there any catch?

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry, I'm not used to people being so nice... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry, I'm not used to people being so nice...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm loving the new house. Thanks again, kid! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm loving the new house. Thanks again, kid!

Entries.DialogueText: I can't believe someone bought me a house! I wonder if it's some kind of scam?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can't believe someone bought me a house! I wonder if it's some kind of scam?

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry, I'm not used to people being so nice... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry, I'm not used to people being so nice...

Entries.DialogueText: Date night with ol' Pam, huh? Hah! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Date night with ol' Pam, huh? Hah!

Entries.DialogueText: Ladies night with ol' Pam, huh? Hah! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ladies night with ol' Pam, huh? Hah!

Entries.DialogueText: Sure thing, kid... I'll see you there.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sure thing, kid... I'll see you there.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, did you hear about the ol' bus?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, did you hear about the ol' bus?

Entries.DialogueText: Yep... I'm back on the saddle, kid... hehe. Feels nice. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yep... I'm back on the saddle, kid... hehe. Feels nice.

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} PamDrank
Entries.DisplayPattern: # PamDrank

Entries.DialogueText: Urghh... my head...$k
Entries.DisplayPattern: Urghh... my head...

Entries.DialogueText: You know, I'd eat healthier food if I could afford it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, I'd eat healthier food if I could afford it.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you probably have a lot of tasty grub growin' on your farm, hm?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you probably have a lot of tasty grub growin' on your , hm?

Entries.DialogueText: Nothin' like a sip o' the good stuff to warm these old bones... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Nothin' like a sip o' the good stuff to warm these old bones...

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... Finally./I need a drink./Gus! Gimme the usual./Hey, I'm back!/Ooh boy, am I thirsty!/I'm parched!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... Finally./I need a drink./Gus! Gimme the usual./Hey, I'm back!/Ooh boy, am I thirsty!/I'm parched!

Entries.DialogueText: Penny! Did you make dinner?/Penny! You done your chores?/Penny! You home?/Hey! I'm home!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Penny! Did you make dinner?/Penny! You done your chores?/Penny! You home?/Hey! I'm home!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, kid. I'd buy you a drink if I could afford it!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, kid. I'd buy you a drink if I could afford it!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey Gus! Gimme another round! *hic* {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey Gus! Gimme another round! *hic*

Entries.DialogueText: *Sigh*... Hey, kid. You're too young to be moping around in a place like this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: *Sigh*... Hey, kid. You're too young to be moping around in a like this.

Entries.DialogueText: *gulp* ... I've been looking forward to this beverage all afternoon. Heh heh.
Entries.DisplayPattern: *gulp* ... I've been looking forward to this beverage all afternoon. Heh heh.

Entries.DialogueText: Oi, Gus! Gimme another pint of your strongest!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oi, Gus! Gimme another pint of your strongest!

Entries.DialogueText: Pam isn't responding.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Pam isn't responding.

Entries.DialogueText: Pam seems out of it. Better leave her alone right now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Pam seems out of it. Better leave her alone right now.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you! Don't be snoopin' around the trailer when I'm out. Got it? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you! Don't be snoopin' around the trailer when I'm out. Got it?

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry, but I gotta be cautious with strangers.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry, but I gotta be cautious with strangers.

Entries.DialogueText: I was reading the newspaper this morning but then I got depressed. It's a rotten world, kid.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was reading the newspaper this morning but then I got depressed. It's a rotten world, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: Keep your head screwed on right and you'll make it through in one piece...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Keep your head screwed on right and you'll make it through in one piece...

Entries.DialogueText: That's what my Pappy always used to say. Heh heh heh. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's what my Pappy always used to say. Heh heh heh.

Entries.DialogueText: You don't know how glad I am that the bus is up and running! I feel alive again.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You don't know how glad I am that the bus is up and running! I feel alive again.

Entries.DialogueText: Times have been tough lately. I got laid off of my job as a bus driver. If I got that job back I could drive you to Calico Desert.
Entries.DisplayPattern: s have been tough lately. I got laid off of my job as a bus driver. If I got that job back I could drive you to Calico Desert.

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} PamDrunk
Entries.DisplayPattern: # PamDrunk

Entries.DialogueText: Blahh... I had one too many caramel porters at the saloon last night... Go away.$k
Entries.DisplayPattern: Blahh... I had one too many caramel porters at the saloon last night... Go away.

Entries.DialogueText: My house ain't pretty but at least it's by the river.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My house ain't pretty but at least it's by the river.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey. Penny's my baby girl. Be nice to her or leave her alone, got it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey. Penny's my baby girl. Be nice to her or leave her alone, got it?

Entries.DialogueText: Penny says I spend too much time at the saloon... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Penny says I spend too much at the saloon...

Entries.DialogueText: It's awful lonely at home all by myself...
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's awful lonely at home all by myself...

Entries.DialogueText: You know, I've been thinking... I wish I had a hobby. Something to do other than hanging around at that saloon every night.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, I've been thinking... I wish I had a hobby. Something to do other than hanging around at that saloon every night.

Entries.DialogueText: You got any ideas?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You got any ideas?

Entries.DialogueText: ...Ehh. Maybe I'll play checkers against myself.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Ehh. Maybe I'll play checkers against myself.

Entries.DialogueText: Each day's just the same as the last... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Each day's just the same as the last...

Entries.DialogueText: If only I'd been born rich... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If only I'd been born rich...

Entries.DialogueText: Make sure your boots are clean before you go stompin' around in my house. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Make sure your boots are clean before you go stompin' around in my house.

Entries.DialogueText: It's annoying to clean a mess. You should know that by now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's annoying to clean a mess. You should know that by now.

Entries.DialogueText: I wish a team of elves would come during the night and tidy up my house. Hahahaha. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wish a team of elves would come during the night and tidy up my house. Hahahaha.

Entries.DialogueText: I could sure go for some parsnips.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I could sure go for some parsnips.

Entries.DialogueText: If my legs weren't so stiff I'd visit the mountains every now and then.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If my legs weren't so stiff I'd visit the mountains every now and then.

Entries.DialogueText: Are you friends with Gus? He's a pretty good guy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you friends with Gus? He's a pretty good guy.

Entries.DialogueText: He even gives me free beer on my birthday.
Entries.DisplayPattern: He even gives me free beer on my birthday.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, watch your mouth! No one tells me what to do! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, watch your mouth! No one tells me what to do!

Entries.DialogueText: ...it isn't? That's terrible! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...it isn't? That's terrible!

Entries.DialogueText: ...Oh. {Portrait:Sad}
Hi, stranger.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, stranger.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, it's Mr. {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, it's Mr. .

Entries.DialogueText: Oh it's Miss {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh it's Miss .

Entries.DialogueText: Do you need my help or something?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you need my help or something?

Entries.DialogueText: I had hopes and dreams like you, once... But look at me now. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I had hopes and dreams like you, once... But look at me now.

Entries.DialogueText: Life doesn't always turn out like you expect.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Life doesn't always turn out like you expect.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah well. There's no sense dwellin' on what you don't have.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah well. There's no sense dwellin' on what you don't have.

Entries.DialogueText: Havin' a local farm is good for our town.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Havin' a local is good for our town.

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe if you do real well on your farm it'll boost the local economy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe if you do real well on your it'll boost the local economy.

Entries.DialogueText: Then everyone will have a job and we'll all be happy, right?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Then everyone will have a job and we'll all be happy, right?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hi there, farmer.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hi there, er.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't often chit-chat with strangers.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't often chit-chat with strangers.

Entries.DialogueText: I always seem to end up at the saloon at some point.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I always seem to end up at the saloon at some point.

Entries.DialogueText: It's too close to my house. It ain't healthy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's too close to my house. It ain't healthy.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Yeah?
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Yeah?

Entries.DialogueText: You're a fine lookin' young man. Why're you wastin' your time talkin' to an old girl like me?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're a fine lookin' young man. Why're you wastin' your talkin' to an old girl like me?

Entries.DialogueText: You're a pretty gal. What're you wastin' your time talkin' to someone like me for?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're a pretty gal. What're you wastin' your talkin' to someone like me for?

Entries.DialogueText: Don't mind that ol' dog next to the house.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't mind that ol' dog next to the house.

Entries.DialogueText: He might look at you cross, but he'll never get up from that box in a hunderd years.
Entries.DisplayPattern: He might look at you cross, but he'll never get up from that box in a hunderd years.

Entries.DialogueText: The old boy's name? It's Dusty.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The old boy's ? It's Dusty.

Entries.DialogueText: Someone's been complainin' about my yard... sayin' it's a mess. Was it you? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Someone's been complainin' about my yard... sayin' it's a mess. Was it you?

Entries.DialogueText: Hmmm...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmmm...

Entries.DialogueText: If I knew you better, I'd be more inclined to chat.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If I knew you better, I'd be more inclined to chat.

Entries.DialogueText: I used to be young, once. Hard to believe, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I used to be young, once. Hard to believe, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: Time sure goes fast when you grow up. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: sure goes fast when you grow up.

Entries.DialogueText: *Sigh*... I guess I'll be popping a frozen dinner into the microwave tonight. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *Sigh*... I guess I'll be popping a frozen dinner into the microwave tonight.

Entries.DialogueText: Penny's the only one I've got, so you best treat her kindly.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Penny's the only one I've got, so you best treat her kindly.

Entries.DialogueText: Every day is the same old routine... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Every day is the same old routine...

Entries.DialogueText: Do you ever have that problem, farmer?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you ever have that problem, er?

Entries.DialogueText: Would you do me a kindness and clean up my house?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Would you do me a kindness and clean up my house?

Entries.DialogueText: Just kidding. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just kidding.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't you have work to do?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't you have work to do?

Entries.DialogueText: You should be thankful that you have a job rather than moping around town all the time.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You should be thankful that you have a job rather than moping around town all the .

Entries.DialogueText: I miss my old truck driving job. I used to go all around the valley, meetin' people, listenin' to the radio.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I miss my old truck driving job. I used to go all around the valley, meetin' people, listenin' to the radio.

Entries.DialogueText: Times sure do change.
Entries.DisplayPattern: s sure do change.

Entries.DialogueText: You got any hogs on that farm?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You got any hogs on that ?

Entries.DialogueText: Do you want somethin' from me, kid? Best look somewhere else.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you want somethin' from me, kid? Best look somewhere else.

Entries.DialogueText: I just hope Penny has a good life ahead of her. If you ever have kids you'll know how I feel.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I just hope Penny has a good life ahead of her. If you ever have kids you'll know how I feel.

Entries.DialogueText: ...It's so dry in winter. My skin feels like old parchment.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...It's so dry in winter. My skin feels like old parchment.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey. You better be treatin' Penny right on that old farm of yours. She's the only one I got!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey. You better be treatin' Penny right on that old of yours. She's the only one I got!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey kid. What're you up to?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey kid. What're you up to?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm just passin' time, same as always.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm just passin' , same as always.

Entries.DialogueText: It's awful cold. A visit to the saloon should warm me up, don't you think? Heh heh.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's awful cold. A visit to the saloon should warm me up, don't you think? Heh heh.

Entries.DialogueText: Why don't you swing by the saloon later for a taste o' the Oh-Be-Joyful?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why don't you swing by the saloon later for a taste o' the Oh-Be-Joyful?

Entries.DialogueText: Penny sure does like old books. I think she's a heck of a lot smarter than I ever was.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Penny sure does like old s. I think she's a heck of a lot smarter than I ever was.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad.

Entries.DialogueText: I oughta take up fishin', seein' as how close the river is.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I oughta take up fishin', seein' as how close the river is.

Entries.DialogueText: Blah... my front yard's a mess. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Blah... my front yard's a mess.

Entries.DialogueText: Howdy, kid. Stayin' dry?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Howdy, kid. Stayin' dry?

Entries.DialogueText: Robin... I... I dunno what to say... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Robin... I... I dunno what to say...

Entries.DialogueText: This is a dream come true... it's all I've ever wanted. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is a dream come true... it's all I've ever wanted.

Entries.DialogueText: ...They probably stayed anonymous so we wouldn't have to feel obligated to them.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...They probably stayed anonymous so we wouldn't have to feel obligated to them.

Entries.DialogueText: Whoever you are... You are truly a pure angel... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whoever you are... You are truly a pure angel...

Entries.DialogueText: Penny, from now on we'll be like a real family... you hear?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Penny, from now on we'll be like a real family... you hear?

Entries.DialogueText: I don't wanna be so bitter all the time anymore... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't wanna be so bitter all the anymore...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm gonna try to turn my life around...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm gonna try to turn my life around...

Entries.DialogueText: Robin... I... I dunno what to say... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Robin... I... I dunno what to say...

Entries.DialogueText: This is a dream come true... it's all I've ever wanted. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is a dream come true... it's all I've ever wanted.

Entries.DialogueText: This must have cost a fortune, {Farmer_Name}... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This must have cost a fortune, ...

Entries.DialogueText: ...To be honest, this is kind of embarrassing. How can I ever repay you for this? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...To be honest, this is kind of embarrassing. How can I ever repay you for this?

Entries.DialogueText: It's a gift... no repayment needed.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a gift... no repayment needed.

Entries.DialogueText: You can start by treating Penny better...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can start by treating Penny better...

Entries.DialogueText: ...I'm sorry. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I'm sorry.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll do whatever you say... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll do whatever you say...

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, kid. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: From now on we'll be like a real family... you hear?
Entries.DisplayPattern: From now on we'll be like a real family... you hear?

Entries.DialogueText: I don't wanna be so bitter all the time anymore... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't wanna be so bitter all the anymore...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm gonna try to turn my life around...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm gonna try to turn my life around...

Entries.DialogueText: Then... I'll just have to swallow my pride...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Then... I'll just have to swallow my pride...

Entries.DialogueText: *ahem*... Thank you, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *ahem*... Thank you, .

Entries.DialogueText: ...We aren't 'poor' anymore, kid... put that thought out of your mind!
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...We aren't 'poor' anymore, kid... put that thought out of your mind!

Entries.DialogueText: This is a dream come true... it's all I've ever wanted. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is a dream come true... it's all I've ever wanted.

Entries.DialogueText: ...They probably stayed anonymous so we wouldn't have to feel obligated to them.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...They probably stayed anonymous so we wouldn't have to feel obligated to them.

Entries.DialogueText: Whoever you are... You are truly a pure angel... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whoever you are... You are truly a pure angel...

Entries.DialogueText: Penny, I'm sorry you had to grow up in squalor... But I'm so happy you've found a good home. We both have, now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Penny, I'm sorry you had to grow up in squalor... But I'm so happy you've found a good home. We both have, now.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm going to try my best to live a good life, now... {Portrait:Sad}

Entries.DialogueText: Robin... I... I dunno what to say... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Robin... I... I dunno what to say...

Entries.DialogueText: Hiya! {Portrait:Happy}

Entries.DialogueText: Gus... I'm awful thirsty, if you catch my drift.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Gus... I'm awful thirsty, if you catch my drift.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}, what's going on here?

Entries.DialogueText: You need to pay your tab right now!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You need to pay your tab right now!

Entries.DialogueText: The saloon isn't doing well, financially
Entries.DisplayPattern: The saloon isn't doing well, financially

Entries.DialogueText: .... {Portrait:Unique}
*sigh* ...Well, I guess I'd better pay off that tab, then. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh* ...Well, I guess I'd better pay off that tab, then.

Entries.DialogueText: It's great Gus. And it tastes even better because it's on the house! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's great Gus. And it tastes even better because it's on the house!

Entries.DialogueText: Whaddya think you're doing?! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whaddya think you're doing?!

Entries.DialogueText: Stop it! I had everything just the way I like it! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Stop it! I had everything just the way I like it!

Entries.DialogueText: It's none of your damn business where I go! {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's none of your damn business where I go!

Entries.DialogueText: Selfish? I put a roof over your head and clothes on your back and you call me selfish!? You ungrateful little... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Selfish? I put a roof over your head and clothes on your back and you call me selfish!? You ungrateful little...

Entries.DialogueText: You'd better go. I'm sorry you had to see this, kid. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You'd better go. I'm sorry you had to see this, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: He's a nice young man...
Entries.DisplayPattern: He's a nice young man...

Entries.DialogueText: She's a nice young lady...
Entries.DisplayPattern: She's a nice young lady...

Entries.DialogueText: But I don't want you tellin' others to clean up my house! It's embarrassing! You understand? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I don't want you tellin' others to clean up my house! It's embarrassing! You understand?

Entries.DialogueText: Heheh... I see the delivery came in. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heheh... I see the delivery came in.

Entries.DialogueText: Let's have a little taste. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let's have a little taste.

Entries.DialogueText: Ptooey!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ptooey!

Entries.DialogueText: I said potato, not fermented baboon kidney! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I said potato, not fermented baboon kidney!

Entries.DialogueText: The juice? Yeah, I tried it, kid. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The juice? Yeah, I tried it, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: How'd it taste? ...Some things are better left unsaid. Let's just leave it at that. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: How'd it taste? ...Some things are better left unsaid. Let's just leave it at that.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, kid...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, kid...

Entries.DialogueText: You caught me prayin'...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You caught me prayin'...

Entries.DialogueText: This here's my new 'Sign Of The Vessel' statue.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This here's my new 'Sign Of The Vessel' statue.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Ordered it from Joja.com with free 2-day shipping. Don't tell Pierre.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Ordered it from Joja.com with free 2-day shipping. Don't tell Pierre.

Entries.DialogueText: ...I've been settling in to the new house. It's really a great place. Feels like home already. I really do appreciate this new comfort. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I've been settling in to the new house. It's really a great . Feels like home already. I really do appreciate this new comfort.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, Sorry...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, Sorry...

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff*... It's just... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff*... It's just...

Entries.DialogueText: ...I should be so happy... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I should be so happy...

Entries.DialogueText: ...But I haven't been able to cut back on the beer... I haven't changed at all... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...But I haven't been able to cut back on the beer... I haven't changed at all...

Entries.DialogueText: For a long time, now... I've felt like there's something missing from my life, {Farmer_Name}... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: For a long , now... I've felt like there's something missing from my life, ...

Entries.DialogueText: I always thought it was about money... Just bein' poor... ya know? So I figured gettin' this house would solve everything. But ...it didn't. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I always thought it was about money... Just bein' poor... ya know? So I figured gettin' this house would solve everything. But ...it didn't.

Entries.DialogueText: So that's... That's why I ordered this statue.
Entries.DisplayPattern: So that's... That's why I ordered this statue.

Entries.DialogueText: Say something to Pam:
Entries.DisplayPattern: Say something to Pam:

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad you're feeling hopeful
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad you're feeling hopeful

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry Pam, but Yoba isn't real...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry Pam, but Yoba isn't real...

Entries.DialogueText: That ain't funny! ...I pour my heart out to you and that's how you respond? What in the void is wrong with you? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That ain't funny! ...I pour my heart out to you and that's how you respond? What in the void is wrong with you?

Entries.DialogueText: I don't care what you say... I have faith in Yoba! Plenty of us do! Now get out. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't care what you say... I have faith in Yoba! Plenty of us do! Now get out.

Entries.DialogueText: Hah! Well, look at me! I'm gettin' real sappy in my old age, aren't I? ...hehehe. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hah! Well, look at me! I'm gettin' real sappy in my old age, aren't I? ...hehehe.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for lendin' an ear, kid
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for lendin' an ear, kid

Entries.DialogueText: Better hurry up, kid... Before ol' Pam here fishes every last lunker out of the tent! Hehe. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Better hurry up, kid... Before ol' Pam here fishes every last lunker out of the tent! Hehe.

Entries.DialogueText: Life don't get much better than this, kid! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Life don't get much better than this, kid!

Entries.DialogueText: I'll come to any event with free grub! You won't see me in the haunted maze, though.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll come to any event with free grub! You won't see me in the haunted maze, though.

Entries.DialogueText: Pass another bottle of pumpkin ale over here!... *hic* {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Pass another bottle of pumpkin ale over here!... *hic*

Entries.DialogueText: Hehe... I put something nice into the punch. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hehe... I put something nice into the punch.

Entries.DialogueText: Shhh... that's just between you and me, kid.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Shhh... that's just between you and me, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey... If you're gonna feed me eggs, I'm gonna need some hot sauce, kid!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey... If you're gonna feed me eggs, I'm gonna need some hot sauce, kid!

Entries.DialogueText: Now this is the life... Huh, kid? Sweet wine, a babbling brook, warm air... Did I mention wine?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now this is the life... Huh, kid? Sweet wine, a babbling brook, warm air... Did I mention wine?

Entries.DialogueText: The red jelly wafting in the wind looks like it's dancing! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The red jelly wafting in the wind looks like it's dancing!

Entries.DialogueText: Heh... Maybe that's just the wine speaking. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heh... Maybe that's just the wine speaking.

Entries.DialogueText: Heh... free buffet. One of the perks of living here. Enjoy it, kid!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heh... free buffet. One of the perks of living here. Enjoy it, kid!

Entries.DialogueText: *slurp* Oh, yeah! I'm gonna need more of this! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *slurp* Oh, yeah! I'm gonna need more of this!

Entries.DialogueText: Don't tell Gus, but I'm a little disappointed there's no buffet tonight.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't tell Gus, but I'm a little disappointed there's no buffet tonight.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, kid. You're a farmer. So tell me... can you make jelly out of these things?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, kid. You're a er. So tell me... can you make jelly out of these things?

Entries.DialogueText: Would save me a lot of money if I could top my toast that way! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Would save me a lot of money if I could top my toast that way!

Entries.DialogueText: Hmmph... I'm still upset I didn't win the ice fishing competition. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmmph... I'm still upset I didn't win the ice fishing comition.

Entries.DialogueText: Mulled wine is the only thing keepin' me warm in this freezing weather! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mulled wine is the only thing keepin' me warm in this freezing weather!

Entries.DialogueText: I plan on winning the ice fishing competition!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I plan on winning the ice fishing comition!

Entries.DialogueText: Willy is gonna be pretty hard to beat, though... He does this kinda stuff day and night. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Willy is gonna be pretty hard to beat, though... He does this kinda stuff day and night.

Entries.DialogueText: I lost last year because I chose a bad spot. I have a good feeling things will be different this time around.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I lost last year because I chose a bad spot. I have a good feeling things will be different this around.

Entries.DialogueText: Hah. Says you! I'll prove you wrong.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hah. Says you! I'll prove you wrong.

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Love}
Same to you, kid.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Same to you, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, hey! Now this is really something! Thanks a million, kid.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, hey! Now this is really something! Thanks a million, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: You did good with this one, kid. Thanks!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You did good with this one, kid. Thanks!

Entries.DialogueText: This just ain't my thing.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This just ain't my thing.

Entries.DialogueText: Now this is just absolutely despicable. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now this is just absolutely despicable.

Entries.DialogueText: (Is this some kind of mean joke?)
Entries.DisplayPattern: (Is this some kind of mean joke?)

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, kid.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, kid. Thanks for inviting me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, kid. Thanks for inviting me.

Entries.DialogueText: Heh, that wasn't too bad!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heh, that wasn't too bad!

Entries.DialogueText: I don't have the chops to catch squid, but that's fine. I'll just cheer you on from here, kid.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't have the chops to catch squid, but that's fine. I'll just cheer you on from here, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, kid... You takin' the day off? It's nice to kick back every once in a while, isn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, kid... You takin' the day off? It's nice to kick back every once in a while, isn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: Yep... Even ol' Pam needs some sunlight on her skin now and then! Just wake me up before I turn into leather... Heheh.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yep... Even ol' Pam needs some sunlight on her skin now and then! Just wake me up before I turn into leather... Heheh.

Entries.DialogueText: Hehehe... Found some old beverages in the back of the fridge.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hehehe... Found some old beverages in the back of the fridge.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm going to the festival today, kid! You'll have to drive yourself. -Pam
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm going to the festival today, kid! You'll have to drive yourself. -Pam

Entries.DialogueText: I'm on vacation today! You'll have to drive yourself. -Pam
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm on vacation today! You'll have to drive yourself. -Pam

Entries.DialogueText: I'm off duty today, kid! You'll have to drive yourself. -Pam
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm off duty today, kid! You'll have to drive yourself. -Pam
